PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-09622016-10-28,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
Canadian Environmental Assessment Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-126 for the 2017 NGTL System Expansion Project
PrecisOrder directing the National Energy Board to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-126 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.(NGTL) in order to authorize the construction and operation of the 2017 NGTL System Expansion Project.
AttachmentsAttachment
